<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The target location for the relocation is described by RE.SectionID and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// RE.Offset.  RE.SectionID can be used to find the SectionEntry.  Each</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// SectionEntry has three members describing its location.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// SectionEntry::Address is the address at which the section has been loaded</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// into memory in the current (host) process.  SectionEntry::LoadAddress is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the address that the section will have in the target process.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// SectionEntry::ObjAddress is the address of the bits for this section in the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// original emitted object image (also in the current address space).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Relocations will be applied as if the section were loaded at</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// SectionEntry::LoadAddress, but they will be applied at an address based</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// on SectionEntry::Address.  SectionEntry::ObjAddress will be used to refer</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to Target memory contents if they are required for value calculations.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The Value parameter here is the load address of the symbol for the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// relocation to be applied.  For relocations which refer to symbols in the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// current object Value will be the LoadAddress of the section in which</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the symbol resides (RE.Addend provides additional information about the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Delta is the distance from the start of the reloc to the end of the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// instruction with the reloc.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="normal">      uint64&#95;t Delta = 4 + (RE.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/relocationentry/#a4b339d832145cb7ea79bbb90f5233897">RelType</a> - <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/coff/#a7d8b48e10ac507c952d8d53a1ed68125a1376dddaf4ade08fe5429571a06c6249">COFF::IMAGE&#95;REL&#95;AMD64&#95;REL32</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> -= FinalAddress + Delta;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="normal">      uint64&#95;t Result = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> + RE.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/relocationentry/#a80213c5b59afecdd125a21b28b9637e9">Addend</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(((int64&#95;t)Result &lt;= INT32&#95;MAX) &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Relocation overflow&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(((int64&#95;t)Result &gt;= INT32&#95;MIN) &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Relocation underflow&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/runtimedyldimpl/#ac7b095afaba91cf9bf59313c8e94d2d9">writeBytesUnaligned</a>(Result, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/target">Target</a>, 4);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ADDR32NB requires an offset less than 2GB from &#39;ImageBase&#39;.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The MemoryManager can make sure this is always true by forcing the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// memory layout to be: CodeSection &lt; ReadOnlySection &lt; ReadWriteSection.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint64&#95;t ImageBase = getImageBase();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &lt; ImageBase || ((<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> - ImageBase) &gt; UINT32&#95;MAX))</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Note unwind info is stored in .pdata but often points to .xdata</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// with an IMAGE&#95;REL&#95;AMD64&#95;ADDR32NB relocation. Using a memory manager</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// that keeps sections ordered in relation to &#95;&#95;ImageBase is necessary.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ((&#42;NameOrErr) == </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;.pdata&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"><Highlight kind="normal">        UnregisteredEHFrameSections.push&#95;back(SectionPair.second);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
